long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use LI Group Sender to connect with your prospects by sending bulk group messages.
Grow your business with LI Group Sender has never been easier.

🔥 FEATURES
✓ Auto Send mass group messages for LinkedIn
✓ One click to send hyper personalized texts
✓ Personalized messages with placeholders & spin syntax template.
✓ Message Template
✓ Save sending history to local storage
✓ Continue task progress from history
✓ Add blacklist in the settings page
✓ Avoid duplicate send by filter all success history or specific history.
✓ Smart random interval and Error Handling

Kindly do not use for SPAMMING which is LinkedIn strictly prohibited.

👋 FAQ
If you have any questions, please keep in touch via help@niomaker.com.

LINKEDIN TOOL FAMILY
you can access our other LinkedIn tools by clicking the tools menu. such as Sales Navigator Scraper, Apollo Export, LinkedIn Search Export and etc.

🔒 DATA PRIVACY
All data is processed in your local computer, never passing through our web server, and no one knows what you save.

💡 DISCLAIMER
Group Sender is not endorsed by or affiliated with the LinkedIn Corporation, registered in the U.S. and other countries. LinkedIn is a trademark of the LinkedIn Corporation.
